name: Financial Education
description: Financial Services Program aims to help all island residents and workers build long-term economic security through financial education and counseling services. One TI works with a variety of partners to help applicants improve their credit score, decrease debt, manage their income, and build their savings. In order to best serve the community, they connect you with partners who can provide the following: Free Tax Preparation Legal assistance to address consumer debt issues Service to assist clie
